so you want to "just use" and USB modem?

which pretty much just worked, not to mention connected about 10 times faster than network-damager

how much ram is used depends on how many, and what, internet sites you have open...
with Internet of todya, 512 may be a bit little for power using, but it's completely usable for sure
note: the line between ubuntu and xubuntu is quite small, you can get xubuntu on any ubuntu by installing "xubuntu-desktop" package
and if you use xubunut installer, you can get full gnome from "ubuntu-desktop" package
so I'd start with xubuntu installer, I think it installs less stuff, and it's always easier to install more than clean up stuff you don't need
